reviewText:
The only issue that I have is that what the series case that came with it. It was not the image that was displayed. The only way to describe the case was that it was in a Clear Plastic VHS Case With the Image of the series. And then the DVD's were secured in a back-to-back CD Case.

I am sorry if it the description does not make sense, but that is the best that I can do. I am only giving it the rating that I give not because of the series review, but because of the Packaging.

It is an awesome movie that I feel everyone should watch!!!!!!!!!!!!!
This is one of my favorite Korean drama with Choi Siwon. I enjoy it every time I watch it and it is wonderful each time.
I love romantic comedies, especially Korean romantic comedies. This drama is one of my favorites. I love the chemistry between the two main characters. Funny and enjoyable.
I watched this drama on TV and enjoyed it so much I had to own it.  It is funny, entertaining and heartwarming.

South Korea produces some of the best television series in the world, and this is one of them.
It would still be a bargain at twice the price! I plan to view it numerous times, and also,
share it with my friends.
